description: Display current active count and trend of issues over time across many accounts.

configuration.name: conditionFilter
configuration.title: Condition Filter
configuration.description: A filter that targets specific conditions to fetch alerts for

configuration.name: entityType
configuration.title: Entity Type [Optional]
configuration.description: If set to a valid entity type, alert counts/trend targeting entities matching that type will be displayed

configuration.name: enableTimePicker
configuration.title: Enable Time Picker
configuration.description: Allows the use of the time picker for timeseries only. If disabled, default timeseries window is 1 day

configuration.name: widgetColor
configuration.title: Widget Color
configuration.description: Color of widget value and timeseries. Accepts hex values or color names. Default: red
